text: Look! I am sending my messenger,3:1. Malachi means “my messenger.” and he will prepare the way for me. The Lord you are seeking3:1. In the light of the previous verses, the idea that God is being sought is surely ironic. will suddenly arrive at his Temple. The messenger of the agreement you say is so happy with you3:1. “You say is so happy with you”: referring back to 2:17. is coming, says the Lord Almighty.
